About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I studied and graduated from the University of California Irvine, with a degree in Software Engineering. Going into college, I did not know what the field of computer science consisted of. However, I slowly began to love the subject. I loved the idea of being able to create anything the mind can design with just the power of a computer. However, due to the fact that other students came in with more resources than I had, I was hit with a huge culture shock. I was competing with students his age who had much greater knowledge of computer science than he had because of the lack of resources I received coming from a low income latino based community.

Despite the competition I got a job at Teens Exploring Technology, I knew this was the place where I can make a change. With a passion in computer science, I was able to introduce computer science and programming to low income students. I created opportunities for students living in disadvantaged communities to learn about the different options college provides, like computer science.

Student Assistant, School of Medicine

October 2015 - September 2017

Known as the handyman for the School of Medicine. Volunteered to do anything that the school needed such as setting up evening classes, assisting numerous instructors in their courses ranging from culinary arts to yoga, helping out the Susan Samueli Integrative Health Institute, and keeping track of medical inventory.

Software Engineer, Teens Exploring Technology

December 2017 - September 2018

Social Enterprise fostering the software engineering skills of boys of color in South L.A to create websites for small businesses and nonprofit organizations as well as provide STEM education to organizations. Learned Ionic and Angular in 3 months and developed 5 applications for the organization including their library system that allows students to borrow books and recieve reminders to return them. Taught students to develop their own start ups and guided them through their respective projects.

Digital Marketing Manager, Talimar Systems Inc.

September 2018 - Present

Came into the company for a temporary data job to gather 10 years of customer experience into a single excel sheet. I completed the task in 2 weeks by creating a Python script that automated the task for the company. Moved up to handling the company's SEO, GoogleAds, website, email blasts, social media, and newsletters. Also completed tasks such as space planning, installation / dissassembly jobs when needed.
